name: urtinfo retro header (ut4_thingley)
description: A retro header for the official Urban Terror site at http://www.urbanterror.info that mimicks the look of 2009 and earlier header graphics. (The version of Thingley used here is the one from 4.1 while the original header used a 4.0 screenshot.) The header only works correctly if the site is set to the default narrow view (“Proportional Width View”).
additional_info:
2012-08-29: release
2014-02-22: added map name; description edit
2014-06-16: reuploaded the images (one of them had expired), updated the URLs
